Description: This is a dataset of the bhagavad gita in which all the data is stored verse-wise in English, Hindi and Sanskrit.

Data is fetched from a free API, for more details you can visit https://bhagavadgitaapi.in.
Dataset has 701 rows corresponding to each verse and has 8 columns with Transliteration, Hindi and English meanings of the verse.
License: Database: Open Database, Contents: Database Contents

Source Name: Bhagavad Gita Q&A Dataset for Modern Life Problem
Description: A Q&A dataset of Bhagavad Gita wisdom for fine-tuning LLMs.
Gita text + translations/commentaries. This dataset is based on a book called 'Srimad Bhagavad Gita' kept at Central Archaelogical Library, New Delhi
Sanskrit+English from GitHub. Same as HF3. Skipped.
